description: T1 - Whitebeam (Sorbus aria)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Final height 5m and spread 3mT2 - Strawberry Tree (Arbutus unedo) - Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Final height 8m and spread 3.5mT3 - Strawberry Tree (Arbutus unedo) - Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Final height 8m and spread 3.5m and remove split limb to south partially overhanging pavement. T4 - Whitebeam (Sorbus aria) - Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Final height 5m and spread 3mT5 - Ash (Fraxinus excelsior) - Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Final height 10m and spread 6mT6 - Common Pear (Pyrus communis) - Crown reduction. Height by 2m, spread by 0.5m. Final height 6m, final spread 2mT7 - Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus) - Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Final height 6m and spread 3m
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
Works agreed to tree labelled T3
Works agreed to tree labelled T7
Works agreed to tree labelled T5
Works agreed to tree labelled T6
Works agreed to tree labelled T4
